EFFORTLESS HOME DELIVERIES 
Budbee makes sure your parcels are delivered to your doorstep in the greenest possible way. Your packages will be delivered during the afternoon/evening since that's when most people are home. 

BUDBEE BOX
Budbee Box is a green and smart delivery service where your parcels will be delivered to a Box of your choice. You will receive the pin code from us that you will use to open the locker, so you can pick up the parcels whenever it suits you!

NEVER MISS A THING 
This is an all-in-one app for your deliveries via Budbee. It allows you to keep track of ongoing orders and gives you an overview of your complete order history, so you never miss a thing! Pretty neat, right? 

WE'RE FLEXIBLE
With Budbee Home, you can choose whether you want the courier to knock on your door, ring the doorbell or leave the package on your doorstep. It is totally up to you! You can also choose the date and time of your delivery in the app and switch your delivery to Budbee Box. 

When ordering with Budbee Box, you choose whatever Box you prefer, and you can, of course, change the Box location should you find that another location suits you better. Did a Box delivery not quite fit your schedule this week? No problem! You can easily change to a Home delivery in the app. 

ALWAYS IN THE LOOP
Whether you ordered with Budbee Home or Budbee Box, we will always keep you up to date with the latest information about your delivery. So you never have to wonder where your parcel is. 

ON-THE-MINUTE ESTIMATES
When choosing Budbee Home, you will receive a 1-hour time slot for the delivery day, so you can go about your evening as planned. With Budbee Box, you will receive an estimated arrival time as soon as your order is on the move. 

EASY RETURNS
Budbee goes both ways! We don't only make sure you get your parcels; we make sure you can return them too!

Want it collected at your doorstep? Use the app to book a pick-up, pack the items in similar packaging as the one you received the goods in, make sure it's sealed, and we will take care of the rest; no need to print any labels! Then it's up to you if you want to hand over the parcel to the driver or if you want to leave it outside your door and let the driver collect it without disturbing you. Simple as that!
 
Want to return it in a Box? Book a return via the app and choose which Box you want to leave the parcel. After confirmation, you have two hours to go to the Box, type in the pin, and leave the package inside the locker. Did you not make it in time? No worries, you can book a new return in the app. 

CUSTOMER SERVICE
We have got your back! Our fantastic customer service team is ready to help you, so do not hesitate to contact us if you have any issues with your order. You can chat with a customer service team member via the app between 9 am and 10.10 pm Monday to Friday. 

BUDBEE PLUS
Budbee Plus members get access to additional features, and we continuously release new, exclusive benefits. You'll be able to select a delivery time of your choice on all orders without having to lift a finger. Use the app to sign up and become a member today!

INSPIRATION
Get inspired and find deals for your next purchase! The inspiration feature allows you to search for any item or webshop that offers delivery via Budbee.

Millions of people have signed up for Bumble to start building valuable relationships, finding friends, and making empowered connections. And now, we’ve been named one of Apple’s 2021 Apps of the Year for connection.
Creating new connections has never been easier. Bumble is working to lift the stigma of online dating by employing unprecedented standards for respectful behavior. Because of this relentless dedication, millions of people are using Bumble to build valuable relationships every single day.

DATING, FRIENDS & NETWORKING

Bumble is at the forefront of matchmaking technology by providing an app that allows users to foster more than just romantic connections. The industry-leading app empowers users to swipe through potential connections across three different modes:

- Bumble Date: On Bumble Date, women make the first move. We’ve changed the archaic rules of the dating game so that you can form meaningful relationships in a respectful way.

- Bumble BFF: Life is better with friends. Whether you’re new to a city or looking to expand your circle, Bumble BFF is the easiest way to make new friends.

- Bumble Bizz: Now we’re in business. Use Bumble Bizz to network, find mentors, and create new career opportunities.


Bumble is the first app of its kind to bring dating, friend-finding, and career-building into a single social networking platform.

CHANGING THE RULES OF THE GAME

At Bumble, women make the first move. In heterosexual matches, the woman has 24 hours to make the first move and the man has 24 hours to respond. In same-sex matches, either person has 24 hours to make the first move, while the other individual has 24 hours to respond, or else, the connection expires. By prompting our users to be bold and make the first move we’ve seen over 3 billion messages sent to date.

THE BUZZ IS REAL

“Bumble exists to empower women...” (Fast Company)
“Bumble is just an app: but it’s changing the discussion.” (Wired)

“What makes Bumble different from other dating apps...is its focus on giving women all the power. ” (Business Insider)

I Am Sober is more than just a free sobriety counter app.

Along with tracking your sober days, it helps you build new habits and provides ongoing motivation by connecting you to a wide network of people all striving for the same goal: staying sober one day at a time.

Through our growing sober community you can learn from others and contribute by sharing insights and tactics that have worked for you.

**The I Am Sober app features:**

• Sober day tracker
To visualize how long you’ve been sober.

• Remember why you quit
Add reasons and photos to help you remember why you want to quit your addiction and stay sober.

• Daily pledge tracker
Take a pledge every day. Sobriety is a 24-hour struggle, so start your day off by making a pledge to stay sober. Then you can review how your day went and log notes at the end of the day.

• Sobriety calculator
View how much money & time you’ve saved by being sober.

• Analyze triggers
Recap each day and find patterns that made your day easier or more challenging than the last.

• Share your story
Either with others or for yourself, take photos and journal your progress directly in the app. Then choose to share it or save it as a reminder for yourself.

• Milestone tracker
Track and celebrate your milestones from 1 day, to 1 week, to 1 month and beyond. Compare experiences with others on their sober journey. Read how they felt at this milestone and what you can expect. If you’re struggling, share your story and invite others to offer help or advice.

• Withdrawal timeline
When you create an account and declare your addiction, you can instantly see a withdrawal timeline to get an idea of what to expect for your next few days (and weeks). What’s more, you can contribute to it. See how many others saw an increase in their restfulness vs those that saw an increase in anxiety. Prepare yourself for what’s to come in recovery.

• Customize your experience
You set the time, your sober birthday, the category of motivation you need, the addictions you’re trying to break, even the end-of-day summaries. Make the app customized to your lifestyle and tailored to your needs.

**Sober Plus subscriptions**

I Am Sober is free to use, but you can support development of the app with a subscription to Sober Plus. With Sober Plus, you'll get access to these premium features:

• Create a group
Stay accountable together and track your sobriety privately. Groups are great for complimenting your real-world group like Alcoholics Anonymous, NA, SA, SMART Recovery, or your rehab center.

• Locked access
Keep your trackers private with a lock that you can access via TouchID or FaceID.

• Data Backups
Save your progress in the cloud and restore your trackers if you get a new device.

• More tracking
Track more addictions and get access to more communities. Even if your addiction is specific like Wine, Online Shopping, or Skin Picking, you’ll find a variety of communities of people who are all trying to get sober from alcohol, drugs, eating disorders, self-harm, and more.

On Unfiltered it's #ThrowbackThursday, everyday. 

Unfiltered is the most low-key and real way to connect with your friends over photos that never made it on other photo sharing apps and are just sitting in your camera roll.

YOUR DAILY THROWBACK
• Everyday you get a random throwback photo from your camera roll, and your friends get a random photo from their own camera roll.

YOUR FRIENDS' THROWBACKS
• If you'd like to see a friend’s throwback photo, you send them a swap request to trade photos.

YOU ARE IN CONTROL
• Only when a swap request is accepted, you see your friend's photo and they see yours. Everyday, you’re in control who sees your photos. 

CAPTIONS
• Add a caption to your photo and make it look like a polaroid from the past!

COMMENTS
• Once you’ve swapped photos you can comment on your friends’ photos and see comments on your friends’ photos.

NOT HAPPY WITH YOUR THROWBACK? AWKWARD PHOTO?
• If you're not happy with your throwback you get up to 5 new random photos every day, just shake your phone before you swap.

EVERYTHING RESETS
• When the new photo comes out the next day, everything resets and it’s time to choose who you swap with again.

HOMESCREEN WIDGET
• Add the Unfiltered widget to see your friends' throwbacks directly on your homescreen!

HAVE FUN!
• Have fun with it! Sharing photos from the past with friends can be fun for you and for your friends!


HEADS UP!
• We don’t have access to your camera roll, nor do your friends.
• Only when you swap a throwback photo with a friend, it’s uploaded to our servers.
• You control every day who you swap photos with. Your daily photo is *only* shared with the people you choose to swap with.
• If you get a photo you don’t want to share, shake your phone to get a new random photo. Choose wisely. 
• Once you’ve sent or accepted a swap request, you can’t change your photo of the day anymore. 
• Everything resets when the throwback comes out the next day.
